original_title: Rise Of The Great White Shark
overview: This film traces the rise of the Great White Shark 11 million years ago in the wake of dramatic changes in Earth's oceans and climate. At the end of an age dominated by giant ocean predators, white sharks evolved in tandem with seals and other pinnipeds in response to cooling conditions. This film is the result of a decade of filming white sharks by renowned "Shark Week" cameraman Andy Casagrande.
title: Rise Of The Great White Shark
